text: Boola; “Enywe Abandu beshitabu itsee khulikhuwa elia habwene hakari wefu ninenyu, khulalaama yesiyesi owulali Nyasaye tawe, ne khulamutsokaasiakhwo nende shiosishosi tawe, nekhulakholana efwe khwifwe okhuba eminyasaye emilesi chilali Nyasaye tawe.” Nenibakhaya boole mbu; “Mube abaloli mbu efwe khuli Abasalamu.”
